infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find meditation centers near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find meditation centers near you.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Allow access to play meditation music from your library
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow access to contacts to add emergency contacts
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is needed to send to emergency contacts in case of emergency
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your location is needed to send to emergency contacts in case of emergency
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Access to contacts is needed to send emergency messages
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Your location is needed to send to emergency contacts in case of emergency

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos for your profile and journal.
